issue.title: SystemSetupDockerInstall should contain the docker installation step

content.raw:
For me it is also unclear how the docker solution container can be built and changed during development. In the tutorials I found descriptions how to download and run the docker containers with the tunnel world. But the part for the own solution is either the running of an existing solution \(subt\_example in the SystemSetupDockerhub\) or is describing the usage of catkin \(Cloudsim\) in the solution container. 

As a newbie to docker I might be wrong, but I came to the impression that all changes in the container are lost after shutting down the container and restarting it. We solved this problem by using a workspace folder that is a folder on the host system that is linked into the docker container by the startup of the container. But I don‘t think that this is the correct usage.

So, any description how the solution container can be setup and used during development of the own solution would be very helpful.
